name: Astro's Playroom
description:
From the team behind the critically acclaimed PlayStation VR adventure ASTRO BOT: Rescue Mission comes a brand new platformer pre-loaded on your PS5 console.1

Explore four worlds, each one showcasing innovative gameplay using the new and versatile features of the PS5 DualSense™ wireless controller.

The game is free for all PS5 console users and is designed to be enjoyed by gamers and families alike.
